name: Touche: The Adventures of the Fifth Musketeer
name_original: Touche: The Adventures of the Fifth Musketeer
description:
Touche: The Adventures of the Fifth Musketeer is an adventure game developed by Clipper Software. It was originally released in 1995. U.S. Gold published the game.
You can play Touche: The Adventures of the Fifth Musketeer on PC.
